nodes.name: RewardsDistributor

nodes.documentation: @dev Recipient is a module, governed by mStable governance

@dev Allows the mStable governance to add a new FundManager
@param _address  FundManager to add
nodes.name: addFundManager

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the mStable governance to remove inactive FundManagers
@param _address  FundManager to remove
nodes.name: removeFundManager
distributeRewards
RewardsDistributor

nodes.documentation: @dev Recipient is a module, governed by mStable governance

@dev Allows the mStable governance to add a new FundManager
@param _address  FundManager to add
nodes.name: addFundManager

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows the mStable governance to remove inactive FundManagers
@param _address  FundManager to remove
nodes.name: removeFundManager
distributeRewards

addFundManager(address).details: Allows the mStable governance to add a new FundManager

constructor.details: Recipient is a module, governed by mStable governance

distributeRewards(address[],uint256[]).details: Distributes reward tokens to list of recipients and notifies them of the transfer. Only callable by FundManagers

params._amounts: Amounts of reward tokens to distribute
params._recipients: Array of Reward recipients to credit

removeFundManager(address).details: Allows the mStable governance to remove inactive FundManagers

userdoc.notice: RewardsDistributor allows Fund Managers to send rewards (usually in MTA) to specified Reward Recipients.
